name: Top Tier Fishing
description:
Coots thinks Ludwig gave too little food today... again...

Therefore she ventures into the night with fish in her mind.
Join her adventure to the yards bridge and see where it leads.
You may even counter friends with the same intentions!

Try to get bigger and better fish!
The frog merchant will sell some items that might help you.
See who is the fastest to offer enough money to the Ludwig statue.
Maybe after the sacrifices for the statue, Ludwig will double your breakfast.

Features:
  • Fish from different tiers
  • Buy cosmetics and items to boost your game
  • Eat or cook fish to gain various buffs
  • Collect enough money to activate Ludwig statue
  • Multiplayer
Multiplayer:
  • See other players fishing with you
  • Show your catch to your friends
  • Communicate with emotes

Hold on tightly to your frog hat for this adventure and capture all the fosh!
